changeSet.author: Adarsh
changeSet.sql: Set search_path = plf,public,pg_catalog;

changeSet.author: murthy.y
changeSet.sql: update SMTparameters set sysparmvalue = 'NO_ADJ' where sysparmcode = 'ROUND_ADJ_METHOD';

changeSet.author: murthy.y
changeSet.sql: update SMTparameters set sysparmvalue = 'N' where sysparmcode = 'DISB_REQ_REQUIRED';

changeSet.author: satyanarayana.g
satyanarayana.g
naga.g
changeSet.comment: Fee Type configuration for the chooses Auto-knock-off

changeSet.author: naga.g
changeSet.sql: UPDATE DATA_ENGINE_TABLE SET KEYFIELDS = 'ID', FILTER = 'HEADER_ID IN (:HEADER_ID)', STATUSUPDATE = null WHERE CONFIGID IN (SELECT ID FROM DATA_ENGINE_CONFIG WHERE NAME = 'DISB_EXPORT_DEFAULT');

changeSet.author: sudheer.t
changeSet.createView: SELECT t4.custcif, t1.reference, t3.fintype, t1.receiptid, t1.receiptdate, t1.receiptamount, t2.depositdate, t2.bankcode AS depositbank, CASE WHEN t1.receiptpurpose::text OPERATOR(plf.=) 'EarlyPayment'::text THEN 'Partial Payment'::character varying ELSE t1.receiptpurpose END AS receiptpurpose, t1.receiptmode, t1.bouncedate AS canceldate, t2.valuedate, t2.payagainstid, t1.bouncedate, t1.realizationdate, t1.cancelreason, t3.closingstatus, t3.finbranch, t3.fincurrassetvalue, t3.productcategory, t6.partnerbankcode, t2.transactionref, t2.fundingac, t1.version, t1.lastmntby, t1.lastmnton, t1.recordstatus, t1.rolecode, t1.nextrolecode, t1.taskid, t1.nexttaskid, t1.recordtype, t1.workflowid, t5.roledesc AS lovdescrequeststage, t2.paymenttype, t1.receiptmodestatus, t1.actfinreceipt, t2.favournumber, t1.knockofftype, t2.receiveddate FROM plf.finreceiptheader_temp t1 LEFT JOIN plf.finreceiptdetail_temp t2 ON t1.receiptid = t2.receiptid LEFT JOIN plf.financemain t3 ON t1.reference::text OPERATOR(plf.=) t3.finreference::text LEFT JOIN plf.customers t4 ON t3.custid = t4.custid JOIN plf.secroles t5 ON t1.nextrolecode::text OPERATOR(plf.=) t5.rolecd::text LEFT JOIN plf.partnerbanks t6 ON t6.partnerbankid = t2.fundingac UNION ALL SELECT t4.custcif, t1.reference, t3.fintype, t1.receiptid, t1.receiptdate, t1.receiptamount, t2.depositdate, t2.bankcode AS depositbank, CASE WHEN t1.receiptpurpose::text OPERATOR(plf.=) 'EarlyPayment'::text THEN 'Partial Payment'::character varying ELSE t1.receiptpurpose END AS receiptpurpose, t1.receiptmode, t1.bouncedate AS canceldate, t2.valuedate, t2.payagainstid, t1.bouncedate, t1.realizationdate, t1.cancelreason, t3.closingstatus, t3.finbranch, t3.fincurrassetvalue, t3.productcategory, t6.partnerbankcode, t2.transactionref, t2.fundingac, t1.version, t1.lastmntby, t1.lastmnton, t1.recordstatus, t1.rolecode, t1.nextrolecode, t1.taskid, t1.nexttaskid, t1.recordtype, t1.workflowid, t5.roledesc AS lovdescrequeststage, t2.paymenttype, t1.receiptmodestatus, t1.actfinreceipt, t2.favournumber, t1.knockofftype, t2.receiveddate FROM plf.finreceiptheader t1 LEFT JOIN plf.finreceiptdetail t2 ON t1.receiptid = t2.receiptid LEFT JOIN plf.financemain t3 ON t1.reference::text OPERATOR(plf.=) t3.finreference::text LEFT JOIN plf.customers t4 ON t3.custid = t4.custid LEFT JOIN plf.secroles t5 ON t1.nextrolecode::text OPERATOR(plf.=) t5.rolecd::text LEFT JOIN plf.partnerbanks t6 ON t6.partnerbankid = t2.fundingac WHERE NOT (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM plf.finreceiptheader_temp WHERE finreceiptheader_temp.receiptid = t1.receiptid))

changeSet.author: sudheer.t
changeSet.createView: SELECT t4.custcif, t1.reference, t3.fintype, t1.receiptid, t1.receiptdate, t1.receiptamount, t2.depositdate, t2.bankcode AS depositbank, CASE WHEN t1.receiptpurpose::text OPERATOR(plf.=) 'EarlyPayment'::text THEN 'Partial Payment'::character varying ELSE t1.receiptpurpose END AS receiptpurpose, t1.receiptmode, t1.bouncedate AS canceldate, t2.valuedate, t2.payagainstid, t1.bouncedate, t1.realizationdate, t1.cancelreason, t3.closingstatus, t3.finbranch, t3.fincurrassetvalue, t3.productcategory, t6.partnerbankcode, t2.transactionref, t2.fundingac, t1.version, t1.lastmntby, t1.lastmnton, t1.recordstatus, t1.rolecode, t1.nextrolecode, t1.taskid, t1.nexttaskid, t1.recordtype, t1.workflowid, t5.roledesc AS lovdescrequeststage, t2.paymenttype, t1.receiptmodestatus, t1.actfinreceipt, t2.favournumber, t2.receiveddate FROM plf.finreceiptheader_temp t1 LEFT JOIN plf.finreceiptdetail_temp t2 ON t1.receiptid = t2.receiptid LEFT JOIN plf.financemain t3 ON t1.reference::text OPERATOR(plf.=) t3.finreference::text LEFT JOIN plf.customers t4 ON t3.custid = t4.custid JOIN plf.secroles t5 ON t1.nextrolecode::text OPERATOR(plf.=) t5.rolecd::text LEFT JOIN plf.partnerbanks t6 ON t6.partnerbankid = t2.fundingac

changeSet.author: sudheer.t
changeSet.createView: SELECT t4.custcif, t1.reference, t3.fintype, t1.receiptid, t1.receiptdate, t1.receiptamount, t2.depositdate, t2.bankcode AS depositbank, CASE WHEN t1.receiptpurpose::text OPERATOR(plf.=) 'EarlyPayment'::text THEN 'Partial Payment'::character varying ELSE t1.receiptpurpose END AS receiptpurpose, t1.receiptmode, t1.bouncedate AS canceldate, t2.valuedate, t2.payagainstid, t1.bouncedate, t1.realizationdate, t1.cancelreason, t3.closingstatus, t3.finbranch, t3.fincurrassetvalue, t3.productcategory, t6.partnerbankcode, t2.transactionref, t2.fundingac, t1.version, t1.lastmntby, t1.lastmnton, t1.recordstatus, t1.rolecode, t1.nextrolecode, t1.taskid, t1.nexttaskid, t1.recordtype, t1.workflowid, t5.roledesc AS lovdescrequeststage, t2.paymenttype, t1.receiptmodestatus, t1.actfinreceipt, t2.favournumber, t2.receiveddate FROM plf.finreceiptheader_temp t1 LEFT JOIN plf.finreceiptdetail_temp t2 ON t1.receiptid = t2.receiptid LEFT JOIN plf.financemain t3 ON t1.reference::text OPERATOR(plf.=) t3.finreference::text LEFT JOIN plf.customers t4 ON t3.custid = t4.custid LEFT JOIN plf.secroles t5 ON t1.nextrolecode::text OPERATOR(plf.=) t5.rolecd::text LEFT JOIN plf.partnerbanks t6 ON t6.partnerbankid = t2.fundingac UNION ALL SELECT t4.custcif, t1.reference, t3.fintype, t1.receiptid, t1.receiptdate, t1.receiptamount, t2.depositdate, t2.bankcode AS depositbank, CASE WHEN t1.receiptpurpose::text OPERATOR(plf.=) 'EarlyPayment'::text THEN 'Partial Payment'::character varying ELSE t1.receiptpurpose END AS receiptpurpose, t1.receiptmode, t1.bouncedate AS canceldate, t2.valuedate, t2.payagainstid, t1.bouncedate, t1.realizationdate, t1.cancelreason, t3.closingstatus, t3.finbranch, t3.fincurrassetvalue, t3.productcategory, t6.partnerbankcode, t2.transactionref, t2.fundingac, t1.version, t1.lastmntby, t1.lastmnton, t1.recordstatus, t1.rolecode, t1.nextrolecode, t1.taskid, t1.nexttaskid, t1.recordtype, t1.workflowid, t5.roledesc AS lovdescrequeststage, t2.paymenttype, t1.receiptmodestatus, t1.actfinreceipt, t2.favournumber, t2.receiveddate FROM plf.finreceiptheader t1 LEFT JOIN plf.finreceiptdetail t2 ON t1.receiptid = t2.receiptid LEFT JOIN plf.financemain t3 ON t1.reference::text OPERATOR(plf.=) t3.finreference::text LEFT JOIN plf.customers t4 ON t3.custid = t4.custid LEFT JOIN plf.secroles t5 ON t1.nextrolecode::text OPERATOR(plf.=) t5.rolecd::text LEFT JOIN plf.partnerbanks t6 ON t6.partnerbankid = t2.fundingac WHERE NOT (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM plf.finreceiptheader_temp WHERE finreceiptheader_temp.receiptid = t1.receiptid))

changeSet.author: shahbaj.b
changeSet.createView: SELECT t4.custcif, t1.reference, t3.fintype, t1.receiptid, t1.receiptdate, t1.receiptamount, t2.depositdate, t2.bankcode AS depositbank, CASE WHEN t1.receiptpurpose = 'EarlyPayment' THEN 'Partial Payment' ELSE t1.receiptpurpose END AS receiptpurpose, t1.receiptmode, t1.bouncedate AS canceldate, t2.valuedate, t2.payagainstid, t1.bouncedate, t1.realizationdate, t1.cancelreason, t3.closingstatus, t3.finbranch, t3.fincurrassetvalue, t3.productcategory, t6.partnerbankcode, t2.transactionref, t2.fundingac, t1.version, t1.lastmntby, t1.lastmnton, t1.recordstatus, t1.rolecode, t1.nextrolecode, t1.taskid, t1.nexttaskid, t1.recordtype, t1.workflowid, t5.roledesc AS lovdescrequeststage, t2.paymenttype, t1.receiptmodestatus, t1.actfinreceipt, t2.favournumber, t1.knockofftype, t2.receiveddate FROM plf.finreceiptheader_temp t1 LEFT JOIN plf.finreceiptdetail_temp t2 ON t1.receiptid = t2.receiptid And t1.Subreceiptmode = t2.paymenttype LEFT JOIN plf.financemain t3 ON t1.reference = t3.finreference LEFT JOIN plf.customers t4 ON t3.custid = t4.custid JOIN plf.secroles t5 ON t1.nextrolecode = t5.rolecd LEFT JOIN plf.partnerbanks t6 ON t6.partnerbankid = t2.fundingac UNION ALL SELECT t4.custcif, t1.reference, t3.fintype, t1.receiptid, t1.receiptdate, t1.receiptamount, t2.depositdate, t2.bankcode AS depositbank, CASE WHEN t1.receiptpurpose = 'EarlyPayment' THEN 'Partial Payment' ELSE t1.receiptpurpose END AS receiptpurpose, t1.receiptmode, t1.bouncedate AS canceldate, t2.valuedate, t2.payagainstid, t1.bouncedate, t1.realizationdate, t1.cancelreason, t3.closingstatus, t3.finbranch, t3.fincurrassetvalue, t3.productcategory, t6.partnerbankcode, t2.transactionref, t2.fundingac, t1.version, t1.lastmntby, t1.lastmnton, t1.recordstatus, t1.rolecode, t1.nextrolecode, t1.taskid, t1.nexttaskid, t1.recordtype, t1.workflowid, t5.roledesc AS lovdescrequeststage, t2.paymenttype, t1.receiptmodestatus, t1.actfinreceipt, t2.favournumber, t1.knockofftype, t2.receiveddate FROM plf.finreceiptheader t1 LEFT JOIN plf.finreceiptdetail t2 ON t1.receiptid = t2.receiptid And t1.Subreceiptmode = t2.paymenttype LEFT JOIN plf.financemain t3 ON t1.reference = t3.finreference LEFT JOIN plf.customers t4 ON t3.custid = t4.custid LEFT JOIN plf.secroles t5 ON t1.nextrolecode = t5.rolecd LEFT JOIN plf.partnerbanks t6 ON t6.partnerbankid = t2.fundingac WHERE NOT (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM plf.finreceiptheader_temp WHERE finreceiptheader_temp.receiptid = t1.receiptid))

changeSet.author: gopalaswamy.m
changeSet.sql: Update Manualadvise Set FeetypeId = (Select FeetypeId from FeeTypes where FeeTypeCode = 'BOUNCE') where BounceId >0 And FeetypeId = 0; Update Manualadvise_Temp Set FeetypeId = (Select FeetypeId from FeeTypes where FeeTypeCode = 'BOUNCE') where BounceId >0 And Feetypeid = 0;

changeSet.author: gopal.p
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE OGL_TRANSACTIONS_QUEUE ADD CONSTRAINT DF_OGL_TRAN_QUE_TID DEFAULT 0 FOR THREADID; ALTER TABLE OGL_TRANSACTIONS_QUEUE ADD CONSTRAINT DF_OGL_TRAN_QUE_PRO DEFAULT 0 FOR PROGRESS;

changeSet.author: gopal.p
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE OGL_TRANSACTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT DF_OGL_TRAN_CA DEFAULT 0 FOR CREDITAMOUNT; ALTER TABLE OGL_TRANSACTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT DF_OGL_TRAN_DA DEFAULT 0 FOR DEBITAMOUNT;

changeSet.author: gopal.p
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE OGL_TRANSACTIONS_FILE ADD CONSTRAINT DF_OGL_TRAN_FILE_CA DEFAULT 0 FOR CREDITAMOUNT; ALTER TABLE OGL_TRANSACTIONS_FILE ADD CONSTRAINT DF_OGL_TRAN_FILE_DA DEFAULT 0 FOR DEBITAMOUNT;

changeSet.author: gopal.p
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE OGL_TRANSACTIONS_LOG ADD CONSTRAINT DF_OGL_TRAN_LOG_CA DEFAULT 0 FOR CREDITAMOUNT; ALTER TABLE OGL_TRANSACTIONS_LOG ADD CONSTRAINT DF_OGL_TRAN_LOG_DA DEFAULT 0 FOR DEBITAMOUNT;

changeSet.author: gopal.p
Saikiran.n
Saikiran.n
saikiran.n
changeSet.sql: select deps_save_and_drop_dependencies ('plf', 'secusers_view');

changeSet.author: saikiran.n
changeSet.createView: SELECT T1.USRID, T1.USRLOGIN, T1.USRPWD, T1.USERSTAFFID, T1.USRFNAME, T1.USRMNAME, T1.USRLNAME, T1.USRMOBILE, T1.USREMAIL, T1.USRENABLED, T1.USRCANSIGNONFROM, T1.USRCANSIGNONTO, T1.USRCANOVERRIDELIMITS, T1.USRACEXP, T1.USRACEXPDT, T1.PWDEXPDT, T1.USRACLOCKED, T1.USRLANGUAGE, T5.LNGDESC LOVDESCUSRLANGUAGE, T1.USRDFTAPPID, T2.APPCODE LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODE, T2.APPDESCRIPTION LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODENAME, T1.USRBRANCHCODE, T4.BRANCHDESC LOVDESCUSRBRANCHCODENAME, T1.USRDEPTCODE, T3.DEPTDESC LOVDESCUSRDEPTCODENAME, T1.USRTOKEN, T1.USRISMULTIBRANCH, T1.USRINVLDLOGINTRIES, T1.USRDESG, T6.DESGDESC LOVDESCUSRDESG, T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL, T7.CODE BUSINESSVERTICALCODE, T7.DESCRIPTION BUSINESSVERTICALDESC, T1.VERSION, T1.LASTMNTBY, T1.LASTMNTON, T1.RECORDSTATUS, T1.ROLECODE, T1.NEXTROLECODE, T1.TASKID, T1.NEXTTASKID, T1.RECORDTYPE, T1.WORKFLOWID, T1.USRDFTAPPCODE, T1.AUTHTYPE, T1.USERTYPE, T1.ACCESSTOALLBRANCHES, T1.LDAPDOMAINNAME, T1.DELETED FROM SECUSERS_TEMP T1 LEFT JOIN PTAPPLICATIONDETAILS T2 ON T1.USRDFTAPPID = T2.APPID LEFT JOIN BMTDEPARTMENTS T3 ON T1.USRDEPTCODE = T3.DEPTCODE LEFT JOIN RMTBRANCHES T4 ON T1.USRBRANCHCODE = T4.BRANCHCODE LEFT JOIN BMTLANGUAGE T5 ON T1.USRLANGUAGE = T5.LNGCODE LEFT JOIN BMTDESIGNATIONS T6 ON T1.USRDESG = T6.DESGCODE LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_VERTICAL T7 ON T7.ID = T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL UNION ALL SELECT T1.USRID, T1.USRLOGIN, T1.USRPWD, T1.USERSTAFFID, T1.USRFNAME, T1.USRMNAME, T1.USRLNAME, T1.USRMOBILE, T1.USREMAIL, T1.USRENABLED, T1.USRCANSIGNONFROM, T1.USRCANSIGNONTO, T1.USRCANOVERRIDELIMITS, T1.USRACEXP, T1.USRACEXPDT, T1.PWDEXPDT, T1.USRACLOCKED, T1.USRLANGUAGE, T5.LNGDESC LOVDESCUSRLANGUAGE, T1.USRDFTAPPID, T2.APPCODE LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODE, T2.APPDESCRIPTION LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODENAME, T1.USRBRANCHCODE, T4.BRANCHDESC LOVDESCUSRBRANCHCODENAME, T1.USRDEPTCODE, T3.DEPTDESC LOVDESCUSRDEPTCODENAME, T1.USRTOKEN, T1.USRISMULTIBRANCH, T1.USRINVLDLOGINTRIES, T1.USRDESG, T6.DESGDESC LOVDESCUSRDESG, T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL, T7.CODE BUSINESSVERTICALCODE, T7.DESCRIPTION BUSINESSVERTICALDESC, T1.VERSION, T1.LASTMNTBY, T1.LASTMNTON, T1.RECORDSTATUS, T1.ROLECODE, T1.NEXTROLECODE, T1.TASKID, T1.NEXTTASKID, T1.RECORDTYPE, T1.WORKFLOWID, T1.USRDFTAPPCODE, T1.AUTHTYPE, T1.USERTYPE, T1.ACCESSTOALLBRANCHES, T1.LDAPDOMAINNAME, T1.DELETED FROM SECUSERS T1 LEFT JOIN PTAPPLICATIONDETAILS T2 ON T1.USRDFTAPPID = T2.APPID LEFT JOIN BMTDEPARTMENTS T3 ON T1.USRDEPTCODE = T3.DEPTCODE LEFT JOIN RMTBRANCHES T4 ON T1.USRBRANCHCODE = T4.BRANCHCODE LEFT JOIN BMTLANGUAGE T5 ON T1.USRLANGUAGE = T5.LNGCODE LEFT JOIN BMTDESIGNATIONS T6 ON T1.USRDESG = T6.DESGCODE LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_VERTICAL T7 ON T7.ID = T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL WHERE NOT (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SECUSERS_TEMP WHERE SECUSERS_TEMP.USRID = T1.USRID))

changeSet.author: Saikiran.n
changeSet.sql: select deps_restore_dependencies ('plf', 'secusers_view');

changeSet.author: Saikiran.n
changeSet.sql: select deps_save_and_drop_dependencies ('plf', 'secusers_rview');

changeSet.author: Saikiran.n
changeSet.createView: SELECT T1.USRID, T1.USRLOGIN, T1.USRPWD, T1.USERSTAFFID, T1.USRFNAME, T1.USRMNAME, T1.USRLNAME, T1.USRMOBILE, T1.USREMAIL, T1.USRENABLED, T1.USRCANSIGNONFROM, T1.USRCANSIGNONTO, T1.USRCANOVERRIDELIMITS, T1.USRACEXP, T1.USRACEXPDT, T1.PWDEXPDT, T1.USRACLOCKED, T1.USRLANGUAGE, T5.LNGDESC AS LOVDESCUSRLANGUAGE, T1.USRDFTAPPID, T2.APPCODE AS LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODE, T2.APPDESCRIPTION AS LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODENAME, T1.USRBRANCHCODE, T4.BRANCHDESC AS LOVDESCUSRBRANCHCODENAME, T1.USRDEPTCODE, T3.DEPTDESC AS LOVDESCUSRDEPTCODENAME, T1.USRTOKEN, T1.USRISMULTIBRANCH, T1.USRINVLDLOGINTRIES, T1.USRDESG, T6.DESGDESC AS LOVDESCUSRDESG, T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL, T7.CODE AS BUSINESSVERTICALCODE, T7.DESCRIPTION AS BUSINESSVERTICALDESC, T1.VERSION, T1.LASTMNTBY, T1.LASTMNTON, T1.RECORDSTATUS, T1.ROLECODE, T1.NEXTROLECODE, T1.TASKID, T1.NEXTTASKID, T1.RECORDTYPE, T1.WORKFLOWID, T1.USRDFTAPPCODE, T1.AUTHTYPE, T1.USERTYPE, T1.LDAPDOMAINNAME, T1.DELETED FROM SECUSERS_RTEMP T1 JOIN PTAPPLICATIONDETAILS T2 ON T1.USRDFTAPPID = T2.APPID JOIN BMTDEPARTMENTS T3 ON T1.USRDEPTCODE = T3.DEPTCODE JOIN RMTBRANCHES T4 ON T1.USRBRANCHCODE = T4.BRANCHCODE JOIN BMTLANGUAGE T5 ON T1.USRLANGUAGE = T5.LNGCODE JOIN BMTDESIGNATIONS T6 ON T1.USRDESG = T6.DESGCODE LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_VERTICAL T7 ON T7.ID = T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL UNION ALL SELECT T1.USRID, T1.USRLOGIN, T1.USRPWD, T1.USERSTAFFID, T1.USRFNAME, T1.USRMNAME, T1.USRLNAME, T1.USRMOBILE, T1.USREMAIL, T1.USRENABLED, T1.USRCANSIGNONFROM, T1.USRCANSIGNONTO, T1.USRCANOVERRIDELIMITS, T1.USRACEXP, T1.USRACEXPDT, T1.PWDEXPDT, T1.USRACLOCKED, T1.USRLANGUAGE, T5.LNGDESC AS LOVDESCUSRLANGUAGE, T1.USRDFTAPPID, T2.APPCODE AS LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODE, T2.APPDESCRIPTION AS LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODENAME, T1.USRBRANCHCODE, T4.BRANCHDESC AS LOVDESCUSRBRANCHCODENAME, T1.USRDEPTCODE, T3.DEPTDESC AS LOVDESCUSRDEPTCODENAME, T1.USRTOKEN, T1.USRISMULTIBRANCH, T1.USRINVLDLOGINTRIES, T1.USRDESG, T6.DESGDESC AS LOVDESCUSRDESG, T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL, T7.CODE AS BUSINESSVERTICALCODE, T7.DESCRIPTION AS BUSINESSVERTICALDESC, T1.VERSION, T1.LASTMNTBY, T1.LASTMNTON, T1.RECORDSTATUS, T1.ROLECODE, T1.NEXTROLECODE, T1.TASKID, T1.NEXTTASKID, T1.RECORDTYPE, T1.WORKFLOWID, T1.USRDFTAPPCODE, T1.AUTHTYPE, T1.USERTYPE, T1.LDAPDOMAINNAME, T1.DELETED FROM SECUSERS T1 JOIN PTAPPLICATIONDETAILS T2 ON T1.USRDFTAPPID = T2.APPID JOIN BMTDEPARTMENTS T3 ON T1.USRDEPTCODE = T3.DEPTCODE JOIN RMTBRANCHES T4 ON T1.USRBRANCHCODE = T4.BRANCHCODE JOIN BMTLANGUAGE T5 ON T1.USRLANGUAGE = T5.LNGCODE JOIN BMTDESIGNATIONS T6 ON T1.USRDESG = T6.DESGCODE LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_VERTICAL T7 ON T7.ID = T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL WHERE NOT (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SECUSERS_RTEMP WHERE SECUSERS_RTEMP.USRID = T1.USRID))

changeSet.author: Saikiran.n
changeSet.createView: SELECT T1.USRID, T1.USRLOGIN, T1.USRPWD, T1.USERSTAFFID, T1.USRFNAME, T1.USRMNAME, T1.USRLNAME, T1.USRMOBILE, T1.USREMAIL, T1.USRENABLED, T1.USRCANSIGNONFROM, T1.USRCANSIGNONTO, T1.USRCANOVERRIDELIMITS, T1.USRACEXP, T1.USRACEXPDT, T1.PWDEXPDT, T1.USRACLOCKED, T1.USRLANGUAGE, T5.LNGDESC LOVDESCUSRLANGUAGE, T1.USRDFTAPPID, T2.APPCODE LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODE, T2.APPDESCRIPTION LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODENAME, T1.USRBRANCHCODE, T4.BRANCHDESC LOVDESCUSRBRANCHCODENAME, T1.USRDEPTCODE, T3.DEPTDESC LOVDESCUSRDEPTCODENAME, T1.USRTOKEN, T1.USRISMULTIBRANCH, T1.USRINVLDLOGINTRIES, T1.USRDESG, T6.DESGDESC LOVDESCUSRDESG, T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL, T7.CODE BUSINESSVERTICALCODE, T7.DESCRIPTION BUSINESSVERTICALDESC, T1.VERSION, T1.LASTMNTBY, T1.LASTMNTON, T1.RECORDSTATUS, T1.ROLECODE, T1.NEXTROLECODE, T1.TASKID, T1.NEXTTASKID, T1.RECORDTYPE, T1.WORKFLOWID, T1.USRDFTAPPCODE, T1.AUTHTYPE, T1.USERTYPE, T1.ACCESSTOALLBRANCHES, T1.LDAPDOMAINNAME, T1.DELETED FROM SECUSERS T1 LEFT JOIN PTAPPLICATIONDETAILS T2 ON T1.USRDFTAPPID = T2.APPID LEFT JOIN BMTDEPARTMENTS T3 ON T1.USRDEPTCODE = T3.DEPTCODE LEFT JOIN RMTBRANCHES T4 ON T1.USRBRANCHCODE = T4.BRANCHCODE LEFT JOIN BMTLANGUAGE T5 ON T1.USRLANGUAGE = T5.LNGCODE LEFT JOIN BMTDESIGNATIONS T6 ON T1.USRDESG = T6.DESGCODE LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_VERTICAL T7 ON T7.ID = T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL
